slides.title: Basic Algebra
slides.content:
**Variable:** Unknown (x, y, z)
**Expression:** 2x + 3
**Equation:** 2x + 3 = 7
**Solve:** Find value of variable

slides.title: Identities
slides.content:
**(a+b)² = a² + 2ab + b²**
**(a-b)² = a² - 2ab + b²**
**a² - b² = (a+b)(a-b)**
**(a+b)³ = a³ + 3a²b + 3ab² + b³**
